text: The Lincoln Continental was an American luxury car first produced around in 1939. The production ended around 1948, but started again during 1956. This car was a fully sized vehicle during most of its years. Its production ended around 2002. The replacement vehicle was Lincoln LS V8. Later, Lincoln introduced a new model, produced between 2016 and 2020. title: Lincoln Continental
